alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Howard; Pettis; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 7:38PM CDT until August 04 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pettis County in central Missouri... Southwestern Howard County in central Missouri... Southeastern Saline County in central Missouri... Cooper County in central Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Smithton, or 9 miles northeast of Sedalia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boonville, Fayette, New Franklin, Pilot Grove, Otterville, Bunceton, Nelson, Hughesville, Blackwater, Franklin, Arrow Rock, Clifton City and Lamine. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 74 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
